snippet: For an entire generation, “The Daily Show” with Mr. Stewart became the news and his departure represents the end of one of the most impressive and influential runs in talk show history.
abstract: Jason Zinoman Critic's Notebook praises Jon Stewart's 16-year tenure on The Daily Show in light of announcement that he will step down in 2016; holds that Stewart revolutionized nightly political humor, becoming news touchstone for an entire generation.
lead_paragraph: For an entire generation, “The Daily Show” with Mr. Stewart became the news and his departure represents the end of one of the most impressive and influential runs in talk show history.
